title: High ping with good internet...
body:
I have try checking the ping 216.52.241.254-t . 
No one use internet here except me. 60 down 5 up.. use to be pretty good  now not... 

ping is around 140 to 160.. is pretty high from Panama to US server.. Tips???

replies.body: Hmmmm I'm not sure what servers you're pinging with 216.52.241.254, but do me a favor and try running a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 using something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/). That'll give me a good idea of how your connection fares on its way to our servers.
